message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand its worth to you is $12000, and I appreciate your interest. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $11500. This price reflects the significant investment made in acquiring it and allows us both to achieve a fair transaction. I believe this offer presents a mutually beneficial arrangement, and I look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.
